pr_title: Improves signLinkFacility, Marks DatabaseController queries long running, Adds UI extension points for tenants/users

timeline.message:
Marks maintenance queries as long running.

There is simply no point in logging or tracing them.
Permits to use the "signLink" facility in POST requests.
Adds additional extension points to the admin UI for users and tenants.
